name: Advanced Optics
desc: Reduces the flux cost of beam weapons by %s with lenses that absorb less energy from the beams they focus.

name: Advanced Targeting Core
desc: Eliminates the %s leading error margin, increasing the effective range of non-missile projectile weapons.

name: Ballistic Rangefinder
desc: Eliminates the %s ranging error margin, increasing the effective range of non-missile projectile weapons.
short: Increases base range of small and medium weapons in ballisic slots.

name: Dedicated Targeting Core
desc:
Eliminates the %s leading error margin, increasing the effective range of non-missile projectile weapons.

Can not be installed on a frigate or a destroyer, and can not work in conjunction with Integrated Targeting Unit.

Most combat ships install either an Integrated Targeting Unit or a Dedicated Targeting Core, with the exception of more specialized variants.
short: Increases weapon range, more so for larger ships.

name: High Scatter Amplifier
desc: Beam weapons deal hard flux damage to shields.
short: Reduces beam range; beams deal more damage and apply hard flux to shields.

name: Integrated Targeting Unit
desc: Eliminates the %s leading error margin, increasing the effective range of non-missile projectile weapons.
short: Increases weapon range, more so for larger ships.

name: Targeting Supercomputer
desc: Eliminates the %s leading error margin, increasing the effective range of non-missile projectile weapons.
